commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas813ece3"

diff:
"813ece3 [OS/2] no bug, fix irritating indent of debug printf
diff --git a/widget/src/os2/nsWindow.cpp b/widget/src/os2/nsWindow.cpp
index ea33a63..015af1a 100644
--- a/widget/src/os2/nsWindow.cpp
+++ b/widget/src/os2/nsWindow.cpp
@@ -1525,7 +1525,8 @@ NS_METHOD nsWindow::Resize(PRInt32 aX,
             Invalidate(PR_FALSE);
 
 #if DEBUG_sobotka
-   printf("+++++++++++Resized 0x%lx at %ld, %ld to %d x %d (%d,%d)\n", mWnd, ptl.x, ptl.y, w, h, aX, aY);
+      printf("+++++++++++Resized 0x%lx at %ld, %ld to %d x %d (%d,%d)\n",
+             mWnd, ptl.x, ptl.y, w, h, aX, aY);
 #endif
 
    }
"
